text: taṅṅaḷuṭe manas'sukaḷil uḷḷatineppaṟṟi avare vivaramaṟiyikkunna (khur'ānil ninnuḷḷa) ēteṅkiluṁ oru ad'dhyāyaṁ avaruṭe kāryattil avatarippikkappeṭumēā enn kapaṭaviśvāsikaḷ bhayappeṭṭukeāṇṭirikkunnu. paṟayuka: niṅṅaḷ parihasiccu keāḷḷū. tīrccayāyuṁ niṅṅaḷ bhayappeṭṭukeāṇṭirikkunnat allāhu veḷiyil keāṇṭu varunnatāṇ‌
